targets.query: SELECT mean("counter_ex_second") FROM "asr9k_np_fabric_counters" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "interface_type" = 'Ingress_fabric-to-bridge' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node", "np", "counter_name", "interface_type" fill(null)

panels.title: $hostname - Controller fabric ERROR|FAILURE counter  ingress fabric to bridge

targets.query: SELECT mean("counter_ex_second") FROM "asr9k_np_fabric_counters" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "interface_type" = 'Ingress_fabric-to-bridge' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node", "np", "counter_name", "interface_type" fill(null)

panels.title: $hostname2 - Controller fabric ERROR|FAILURE counter  ingress fabric to bridge

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 10s) FROM "errors" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" =~ /in_/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "if_name", "type"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 10s) FROM "errors" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname2$/ AND "type" =~ /in_/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "if_name", "type"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 10s) FROM "errors" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" =~ /out_/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "if_name", "type"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 10s) FROM "errors" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname2$/ AND "type" =~ /out_/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "if_name", "type"

panels.title: $hostname - CPM CPU - Virtual Processor for LC
$hostname2 - CPM CPU - Virtual Processor for LC
$hostname - CPM CPU - Virtual Processor for admin
$hostname2 - CPM CPU - Virtual Processor for admin
CPU Usage - Virtual (Not applicable for all routers > 7.1.3)

targets.rawSql: select router.hostname, interface.if_name, interface.description from interface join router on router.id = router_id where router.hostname like '$hostname'

select router.hostname, interface.if_name, interface.description from interface join router on router.id = router_id where router.hostname like '$hostname' and interface.if_name like '$all_interfaces'

panels.title: $hostname - Interface Description based on Value Selected
Controller fabric counter $hostname ingress fabric to bridge
Controller fabric counter $hostname2 ingress fabric to bridge
Controller fabric ERROR|FAILURE counter $hostname ingress fabric to bridge
Controller fabric ERROR|FAILURE counter $hostname2 ingress fabric to bridge

panels.description:
bps multicast traffic that has been sent for replication and which has been received after replication for each NP Traffic Manager (TM) ASIC.


Physical limitation:

Typhoon  40 Gbps

Tomahawk 158 Gbps.

panels.description:
If dopped pkts are recorded that means that defined rate limit has been reached and need to be increased.

show lpts pifib hardware police location 0/0/CPUX | i "FlowType|IGMP"
